Package test

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
test.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrick, ClayBrick, SteelBrick
public abstract class Brick
extends java.lang.Object
The Brick Class refers to a singular brick we see above the game. Refactoring - The Class Crack that was nested into the Brick Class has been refactored to a singular Class outside of Brick so that its purpose is more clear. Added a getter method for the rnd variable (in order to build on encapsulation) so that it can be accessed from the Crack class. The Brick Class consisted of an unused variable called MIN_CRACK, this has been removed to increase understanding and readability of the code.

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick​(java.lang.String name, java.awt.Point pos, java.awt.Dimension size, java.awt.Color border, java.awt.Color inner, int strength)
      This is the constructor for Brick Object.
      Parameters:
      name - Refers to the name of the brick.
      pos - The top-left position of the brick.
      size - The Dimension of the brick (width and height)
      border - The outer color of the brick.
      inner - The inner color of the brick.
      strength - The strength of the brick (How many impacts it can handle).

  • Method Details

    • makeBrickFace

      protected abstract java.awt.Shape makeBrickFace​(java.awt.Point pos, java.awt.Dimension size)
      This method is used to make the face of the brick (Rectangle).
      Parameters:
      pos - The top left position (coordinates) of the brick.
      size - The width and height of the brick (Dimension).
      Returns:
      Returns Rectangular Shape of the brick face.

    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point, int dir)
      This method handles strength reduction of bricks on impact. It also checks if the brick is broken.
      Parameters:
      point - Refers to the edge of the ball making contact with the brick.
      dir - Refers to the direction (edge) of the brick that is making contact with the ball.
      Returns:
      Returns boolean value based on whether the brick makes or not.

    • getBrick

      public abstract java.awt.Shape getBrick()
      Getter for a singular brick.
      Returns:
      Returns the Shape of the brick.

    • getBorderColor

      public java.awt.Color getBorderColor()
      Getter for the outlining color of brick.
      Returns:
      Returns the Color of the border of the brick.

    • getInnerColor

      public java.awt.Color getInnerColor()
      Getter for the inner color of brick.
      Returns:
      Returns the Color of the inside of the brick.

    • findImpact

      public final int findImpact​(Ball b)
      This method is used to find in which direction the ball hit the brick.
      Parameters:
      b - Refers to a ball object.
      Returns:
      Returns Int Type, which corresponds to the direction of impact.

    • isBroken

      public final boolean isBroken()
      Method to find if a brick is broken already.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean value based on the brick's condition.

    • repair

      public void repair()
      Resets the strength of a brick to its full state.

      Method used to decrease the strength of a brick on impact.
